title: How did new technologies spark the Agricultural Revolution? - Quora

response.answer_text: The new technology involving the horse and plow made an enormous difference.It enabled a farmer to increase the land being cropped by several orders of magnitude. The Industrial Revolution gave rise to the motorized tractor, which increased the ability to farm land several more magnitudes. The development of specialized seeds, soil management, crop rotation, more advanced machinery increased production much more. The amalgamation of farms into huge entities adapted to single crop management increased production still further. Without it all we would not be able to feed the explosion of human population on this planet.A good thing, I guess.
